sign_in_description: There was an error signin in with your wallet. Retry
league_description: There was an error getting information about this league. Retry
join_league_description: There was an error joining league. Retry
already_participant_description: You cannot join this league because you are already a participant. If the problem persist, contact us
lock_value_description: There was an error locking value for this league. Retry
donation_description: There was an error making a donation for this league. Retry
league_started_description: Cannot perform operation because this league is already started
league_ended_description: Cannot perform operation because this league is already ended
no_rewards_to_claim_description: There are no rewards to claim for this league
no_refunds_to_claim_description: You cannot refund the entry ticket for this league because you are not a participant or you have already refunded the ticket
user_already_has_code_description: You cannot generate a referral code for this league because you already have one. If the problem persist, contact us
gen_code_description: There was an error generating referral code for this league. Retry
claim_description: There was an error claiming rewards or refunding the entry ticket. Retry
insufficient_funds_description: You don't have enough funds to perform this operation. Check your balance and retry
